file_content.text: Nice to know we can count on the Republic again.
I have the data files. The encampment is without a commander as well.
Nice work. I said I'd throw in a bonus if you got rid of him, and I'm as good as my word.
You said you don't work cheap, and I promised a bonus if you took him out. And I honor my promises.
I have the data files.
Never thought I'd say this to someone from the Republic, but I'm impressed.
You're expensive, but at least you're worth it.
You saved a lot of lives by doing this. My friends and I owe you. Thanks.
Bring me the intel files from the encampment before the Imperials decode them.
A Jedi? Don't see too many of your kind on Balmorra these days.
Nice to see you Republic soldiers back on Balmorra. Kinda wished you'd never left.
You don't look like you're part of the resistance. You must be with the Republic, right?
Name's Taya Rinn. Been fighting the Imperials here on Balmorra since I learned to walk.
So, you in this for the long haul? Or is the Republic going to cut and run again as soon as things get tough?
The Republic has got your back. Count on it.
We will support you.
I'd like to believe that. But actions speak louder than words.
I thought you'd be a little more appreciative of all the help we're giving you now.
You sound pretty bitter.
We put our trust in the Republic, and they left us high and dry. But I know how you can make amends.
I understand your frustration.
We don't want sympathy. We want help. And if you're serious, now's your chance to prove it.
I was at a nearby encampment when the Imperials hit us. Barely got out alive. Had to leave our intel files behind.
If we don't get those data files back before the Imperials decode them, the resistance is in real trouble.
What's on those files, exactly?
They sound important.
Locations of resistance outposts. Names of spies and sympathizers inside the Imperial ranks. Stuff we don't want to fall into the wrong hands.
I'll help you.
I'm willing to pay good credits for this job. A lot of resistance lives will be lost if you can't recover those files.
Take out the leader of the Imperial forces at the Neebray encampment, and I'll throw in a nice bonus, too.
Taking out Imperials is part of my job.
I'd help you anyway.
Nice to meet a Jedi who prefers action over meditation.
A Jedi is not motivated by material wealth. I will help you because it is the right thing to do.
I would help you anyway.
Very noble of you. I guess the stories about the Jedi are true.
We're on the same side.
I'd help you anyway.
If all the Republic soldiers shared your attitude, we'd have driven the Imperials off Balmorra years ago.
I figure the Republic owes you.
I'd help you anyway.
Sorry. Just figured you were a mercenary. It's nice to see somebody here for the right reasons.
Sounds like a plan.
I hope you're not stingy.
I didn't think the Jedi were into material wealth. Don't worry, though; you'll get plenty. After the mission.
Didn't think you'd be so mercenary about it. Don't worry, though; you'll get plenty. After the mission.
Break into the encampment and get the data files from the main computer, then bring them back to me.
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
Should have known better than to expect help from the Republic.
I'm not in the mood to talk.
The old encampment isn't too far off. There's an army of Imperial special ops camped out inside. Parasites.
You'll have to beat their leader to make it out with the intel. He won't be easy, but that's why I'm paying.
Break into the recon encampment, take out their leader, and get the data files from the main computer.
If you can get those files back here. I'll have plenty of payoff waiting.
Break into the recon encampment and get the data files from the main computer, then bring them back to me.
